CURRENT STATE:
user_proxy_agent.name: user

content.plan: 1. Navigate to the Wikipedia main page at 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page'. 2. Click on the search input field to focus it. 3. Enter the search term 'Python programming language' into the search input field. 4. Click the search button to initiate the search. 5. Verify that the page navigates to the URL 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_(programming_language)'. 6. Verify that the first heading of the article is exactly 'Python (programming language)'. 7. Verify that the article content contains the text 'Guido van Rossum'. 8. Click on the link with the text 'Guido van Rossum' within the article. 9. Verify that the page navigates to a URL containing the substring 'Guido_van_Rossum'. 10. Verify that the first heading of the article is exactly 'Guido van Rossum'.
content.next_step: Navigate the browser to the Wikipedia main page at 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page'. After the page loads, verify that the current URL is exactly 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page' and that the main page is displayed. If the page does not load or the URL is incorrect within 10 seconds, report failure and stop.
